tests.expected: User should be redirected to the home page.

tests.instruction: Press on the request tag button.
Press on the request tag button. Fill in at least the tag name, and press submit.
tests.expected: Request should be submitted, viewable in the admin page. The request tag window should close, and a pop up message appears notifying the user.
User should be redirected to their own profile page.
User should be redirected to their message page, and private chats appear by default.
User should be redirected to the settings page.

tests.instruction: Log in with an admin account. (Note: apply for admin if you want to test this. If you don't know how, you have not read our README carefully)
tests.expected: User should be redirected to the admin page.

tests.instruction: Input some text into the search bar. Hit enter or press search.
tests.expected: All users with username that has search parameter as substring appears in the result list.
